webinar_title: Making the best out of a bad situation
webinar_subtitle: How tax-loss harvesting can help your long-term investments come out on top after a market drop
small_description: The market went down another 10% and you are thinking: Should I liquidate now or it is too late? Making informed and data-driven decisions are critical in moments of panic as not only can save you a lot of money but make you even more in the long run.
bullet_point_1: Historically, what would have happened if you sold/bought during market crashes
bullet_point_2: Why tax-loss harvesting is *very* important during market volatility and how to do it super fast
bullet_point_3: Open discussion with our Investment and Machine Learning team
